title: Lost Soul: AJ's Burden
description: Can Trystain save AJ before he hits rock bottom? Can he protect him from the demon lurking in his mind? Drowning in a severe drug addiction, battling to survive, AJ doesn’t know where to turn. If he doesn’t find his feet soon, he will die on the streets of San Francisco. Trystain is a recovering addict. Five years ago, he discovered rock bottom first hand. Helping others who’ve fallen victim to drugs gives him hope for a better tomorrow. When AJ lands at on Trystain’s doorstep, Trystain gets more than he bargained for. Not only is AJ at the end of his rope, but there is something darker going on. Driven to protect AJ from a future he knows too well, Trystain takes AJ under his wing. He is determined to help him come clean. But will mistakes from Trystain’s past be barriers for their future? It’s hard to move forward when you can’t stop looking back. **Please heed trigger warning. See Look Inside for details before purchasing this book**
author: Nicky James
